description:
*** tran-go - THE 5-in-1 TRAVEL DICTIONARY - AVAILABLE IN SEVERAL LANGUAGE COMBINATIONS ***

tran-go is a completely offline travel dictionary for smartphones in 5 languages
including a total of over 30.000 entries. Essential for your journey! 

tran-go EU-5 contains the following languages:

-Italian
-Russian
-Hungarian
-German
-English 


Features: 
-Specifically assembled travel vocabulary for your journey 
-Total of over 30.000 entries in 5 languages 
-Includes modern terms 
-Includes useful phrases and sentence structures 
-Yet another plus: Vocabulary completely offline, no Internet connection required 
-Simultaneous translation from the selected source language to all other 4 languages with one click
-Indication of the travel situation for each term (Everyday life, Gastronomy, Medicine, Tourism etc.)
-Filtering of the results by arbitrary situations
-Ease of Use 
-Simplified input by auto completion of the search term 
-Quick source language change
-Localisation of the app for all available languages
